amendment.description: To increase funding for the State Criminal Alien Assistance Program and offset the increase by reducing NASA funding.

action.text: Motion to table amendment SA 3295 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 68 - 25. Record Vote Number: 367.

Amendment SA 3295 proposed by Senator Ensign. (consideration: CR S12895-12896, S12904-12905, S12905-12906; text: CR S12895-12896) To increase funding for the State Criminal Alien Assistance Program and offset the increase by reducing NASA funding.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Motion to table amendment SA 3295 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 68 - 25. Record Vote Number: 367.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3295 proposed by Senator Ensign.
